FIlthy room........carpet was stained with God knows what, there was popcorn on the floor, cobwebs hanging from the ceiling, light could be seen all around our closed door, paint peeling off the door in the room and bathroom, mildew in the bathroom, toenail clippings behind the night stand, broken table, very, very small TV and filthy bedding. We ended up at a Daysinn on International Drive which was heaven compared to this hole!!! Not worth the money whatsoever!

Reviews.Title: “Terrific Value and Location”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Take it from a frequent traveler whose has stayed at many premium hotels (Hilton, Marriott, Little America, etc.), the Rodeway Inn Maingate offers exceptional value for the low rate it charges. It is literally minutes from the Disney attractions. It has clean rooms, swimming pool, and friendly staff. We stayed for ten days and plan to stay here again in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Good Place to Stay for the Money and than some”
Reviews.Author: Dottie51460
Reviews.Content: I was alittle skeptical staying off property but I found a good price at this Rode Way Inn. I had a second floor room and didn't really care for lugging my suitcases upstairs. However, the room was gorgeous and much bigger I thought than the Disney motel I had stayed in, in January. The pool was great for swimming and went from 4 foot to 6 foot. It was fenced in. There was no hot tub thought I would have loved one. The pool was fabulous. The front desk staff were very friendly and very helpful. I had one negative about the staff and that was when I had asked about a taxi to the park. The shuttle only goes out in the morning hours, and I came in around 2 in the afternoon. The taxi company the motel sent for was nasty, wouldn't take my credit card after the motel told me they would and charged me $25 for a ride that shouldn't have cost that much even the motel said the same thing. They were going to look into it, but I never heard anything back on it. There are two motels right near the motel an IHop and a Waffle House. I took a day of walking and found a variety of places in both directions all within walking distance. I found the Lynx bus service extremly helpful for the days I couldn't make the shuttle and very affordable. Over all the motel stay was very good. Housekeeping was great. Breakfast was a joke for sure at the motel. Continental Breakfast needs an improvement. But for the money it was good.

Reviews.Title: “Honestly the worst place I have ever stayed in my life!”
Reviews.Author: KarenPenguin
Reviews.Content: I am truly disgusted in the stay that I had at the Rodeway Inn - Maingate in Kissimmee, Florida. We were vacationing in Orlando, tried to get a last-minute reservation on 3/24/06 at a local hotel and couldn't because they were full (as were almost all hotels we tried due to Spring Break). I called the chain's 1-800 number to try another hotel and the woman suggested the Rodeway Inn. I took it immediately without any further investigation. When we arrived, the room keys did not work and had to walk back to the main lobby to have them reactivated. When we did get into the room we were blown away with a horrible stuffy/stale/moldy smell that we found was coming from the refrigerator that was unplugged (or at least I believe that was the source). We had to open the door to get fresh air in for over an hour. Then, when we turned on the heater, a horrible burning smell came out of it. To my 4-year-old's horror, we found a dead cockroach lying on the floor next to the refrigerator, rust on the floor in the bathroom along with VERY outdated fixtures, floors, etc. THANK GOD we did not have to wash up in the morning and just left to head back home. My husband wouldn't even get out of his clothes and put on his pajamas due to the nasty environment. My daughters and I did and when we walked bare-foot around in the room and then sat on the bed, we found that the bottoms of our feet were DIRTY!! I couldn't believe it!!! We washed them and tested it out again and it was true! The carpet was so terribly filthy that it caused the bottoms of our feet to turn brown!!! We wanted to leave immediately but could not find another hotel at this late time during Spring Break in Orlando! Plus, they informed me that they had already charged my account when I had reserved the room and had not checked in by 4pm. I felt trapped. The beds were hard and thread-barren. I worried all night that someone was going to either break into my room or break into my car. I am a working-class city-girl and not in need of the finest things, but good grief. I honestly have never stayed in such a filthy, out-dated hotel in my entire life!

Reviews.Title: “Don't lose your money!!!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Don't lose your money and time, not recomended is ugly and the rooms are dirty. Who said is this motel OK...that person need mental attention!

Reviews.Title: “Stay somewhere else”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: It started off nice as far as arriving at midnight and getting checked in in about 5 minutes. The room appears nicer on the website. When we walked in, my boyfriend said "is this a joke?" As soon as you walked in, the microwave and fridge were right there. The microwave was tiny. The fridge was a decent size for what we needed, just to keep drinks cold. We never saw anything about the "continental breakfast", but Waffle House and Ihop were both right there, so we made good use of that. We also liked the Racetrac gas station/store that is located next to the motel. This is a motel not Hotel. The air conditioner/heater was very noisy, but it managed to block out the sound of the annoying neighbor who chose to yell at her kids at 7am for 4 days in a row. The shower, well lets say it went hot to cold so many times that you dreaded getting in. Towels were replenished everyday. The room was only vacuumed once while we were there. The internet connection was dial-up, but it works. They offer discount tickets to the parks, and I would not recommend asking about it. They push very hard for you to buy a time share. And when you say no, they get very pushy and rude. The cable tv that they have is very limited, basic cable. No fresh air available unless you choose to leave the door open, the window was bolted shut.

Reviews.Title: “bus ride forever”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: The service overall was fine however having hot water for only one shower one person everyday was not fun and I feel a few of the offers are misleading. For instance when you say shuttle service you think it will be fairly short and easy. Since this hotel is only located less than 20 mins from the Disney parks I don't think that a "shuttle ride" should take one hour and twenty minutes to get you back to your hotel for the night. It was ridiculous especially for the people with small children. This was after waiting twenty minutes just get picked up. Also continental breakfast should be a little more than coffee, juice and small stale blueberry muffins only everyday.

Reviews.Title: “Few Positive, Many Negative”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Rodeway Inn Maingate in Kissimmee - Prepaid 5 nights starting 29 Dec. 2005. Positive - Location is positive feature. Positive - in room refrigerator and microwave. Positive - very nice pool. Negative - no restrictions on pool use. Loud laughing and yelling at 2 am from pool disturbed sleep. Pool is only 30 - 40 feet from half the rooms because they surround the pool. Negative - Housekeeping poor. The room had not been vacuumed prior to arrival and continuing build up of lint and dirt showed daily cleaning was poor. The room was vacuumed only once during stay. The bed was not made except to spread the cover over unstraightened sheets. Coffee packet in room was not replaced after use, preventing use of in room coffee maker the next day. Negative - misrepresented continental breakfast. The breakfast available consisted of juice, coffee and low quality rolls in plastic wrap. No fruit, cereal, yogurt, or bread. No plates or napkins. Plan on buying breakfast at a restaurant. Negative - poor mainteneance. Toilet flapper valve leaked causing the toilet to refill every five minutes. Called to repair two days in a row. No effective action taken. We resorted to shutting off water to toilet every night to prevent sleep from being disturbed by toilet noise. Roof gutters leak spraying covered walking paths with water before and after rain.

Reviews.Title: “very surprised!”
Reviews.Author: domincfh
Reviews.Content: After reading all the reviews on this website, i was almost going to cancel my booking and find another hotel, but i figured why not give it a shot. Arrived at 1 am on a friday night and it took about 5 minutes to check in (no problems). Got to rooms on the second floor. Was expecting a trash pile in my room. VERY VERY SURPRISED. Rooms were clean and comfortable. Spent awhile looking for dirt or insects. Room was spotless! towels and soaps given out every day. LOCATION WAS GREAT. had an ihop and waffle house right next store. Also a racetrack gas station with a foodmart (all within walking distance. LOCated literally 2 minutes away from disney property. People came on here and stated they came in expecting alot. well for a 30 dollar a night room you shouldn't expect alot. Rooms were old and outdated but for 30 bucks what do you expect? Maybe i just lucked out and got two clean room swith no bugs and working airconditioners. BUt if your just looking for a clean room close to disney then you should try this place out.

HotelInfo.Name: Rodeway Inn Maingate
HotelInfo.Address: 5995 W Hwy 192, Kissimmee, FL 34747
